fact_list.fact_text: Directional signs are usually rectangular with a green background.
There are two types of directional signs: Advance and Confirmation Directional Signs.
Confirmation Directional Signs have a chevron shape on one end to indicate the direction.

On all roads leading to destinations along expressways, signs have either yellow letters on green backgrounds with yellow borders, which will be phased out, or white lettering on green backgrounds, with the white text describing an expressway destination encased in a blue background.
